name: Dream Chronicles: The Book of Air
summary: The epic Dream Chronicles saga continues in PlayFirst's award-winning adventure series. Play as Lyra, Faye's daughter, who finds herself trapped in a strange dimension on the day before her 18th birthday. Following clues sent by her grandfather, she flies across the realm in search of the Clockmaker who will help her restore time and return home. Solve intriguing puzzles and search for items that will reunite Lyra with family and friends in The Book of Air!
